title: Forensic Compliance Trace Report Schema (CTG Output)
description: Defines the mandatory structure for compliance trace reports generated by CTG, ensuring immediate parsing by forensic analysis components.

ContextID.description: Unique context identifier for the failed operation.

ViolatedGRS.description: Details of the specific GRS violation leading to veto.

ActionPathSnapshot.description: URI pointing to the specific segment of the TIAR log proving violation context.

ActionableRecommendation.description: Proposed remediation step derived from the trace.
